t: Galderma - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - Galderma SA is a Swiss pharmaceutical company specializing in dermatological treatments and skin care products. Formerly a subsidiary of L'Oréal and Nestlé, it was acquired by a consortium of private institutional investors in 2019 and remained under their ownership until its IPO in 2024.
